original_text: When they went, they went upon their four sides; they turned not as they went, but to the place whither the head looked they followed it; they turned not as they went.
korean_text: 그룹들이 나아갈 때에는 사방으로 몸을 돌리지 아니하고 나아가되 몸을 돌리지 아니하고 그 머리 향한 곳으로 나아가며

sentences.original_text: they went upon their four sides
they turned not as they went
whither head looked they followed it
sentences.korean_translation: 머리가 향한 곳으로 그들은 그것을 따랐으며

sentences.original_text: they turned not as they went
